message:
Has anyone heard anything about or used GNU Health?

http://health.gnu.org/

I was working on simple web app that I was planning to open-source for managing medical records for small clinics and such (because a lot of people are still using paper records which is terribly inconvenient for everyone)

Then I stumbled on this, which seems to be an open source medical record and management software. Haven't tried it, curious if anyone has any thoughts!
story: Omar Sameh Shehata shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: // GNU Health - Freedom and Equity in Healthcare //
caption: health.gnu.org
description: Its modular design allows to be deployed in many different scenarios: from small private offices, to large, national public health systems. It covers the functionality of Electronic Medical Record (EMR), Hospital Management, and Health Information System (HIS).
